snippet: Texas voters rejected a plan to convert the Houston Astrodome into a convention center, very likely dooming it to demolition.
abstract: Texas voters reject a plan to convert the Houston Astrodome into a convention center, very likely dooming it to demolition; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Texas voters rejected a plan to convert the Houston Astrodome into a convention center, very likely dooming it to demolition.

headline.main: Texas Voters Say No to Astrodome Plan
